column6: Spidey's got a new lease on life, new powers, and a new costume, courtesy of his new best friend Tony Stark.  So what could possibly go wrong?  Lots, True Believer.  With clouds quickly building on the horizon, the bonds that Spider-Man now forges may very well determine his capacity to withstand a storm that will shake the entire Marvel Universe.
column8: | penciller (cover):Ron Garney | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Jose Pimentel
